description:
Here is a clip from tomorrow's podcast. In it, nuclear physicist James Walker and Dr. Peterson discuss the environmental cost when developmental growth is restricted due to alarmism. The full episode releases tomorrow at 5PM ET.

Dr. Peterson's extensive catalog is available now on DailyWire+: https://bit.ly/3KrWbS8

title: The Cost of Mass Poverty - It's Not Good
